references: T. M. Apostol, Introduction to Analytic Number Theory, Springer-Verlag, 1976, page 39.
Feist, Andrew R., Fun With the Sigma-Function, unpub.
maple: t := 1; a := proc(n,t) local t1,d; t1 := 0; for d from 1 to n do if n mod d = 0 then t1 := t1+d^t*mobius(d)*mobius(n/d); fi; od; t1; end;
mathematica: a[n_] := (k = 0; Do[If[Mod[n, d] == 0, k = k + d*MoebiusMu[d]*MoebiusMu[n/d]], {d, 1, n}]; k); Table[a[n], {n, 1, 78}](* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 13 2011, after Maple *)
author: Andrew R. Feist (arf22540(AT)cmsu2.cmsu.edu)
